title: Viktor Polyakov
text: Viktor Lvovych Polyakov (born September 29, 1981 in <a href="Perm%2C%20Russia">Perm</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>) is a <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> from <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>, who competed at the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Olympics">2004 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Athens%2C%20Greece">Athens, Greece</a>.
